channel.title: recently on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in recently on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Altos bursts out of stealth with $3B, a dream team C-suite and a wildly ambitious plan to reverse disease (3 minute read) Altos Labs is a biotech company that is developing technology that could revitalize cells and reverse disease, ultimately prolonging human life.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-15
item.description: Google is building a new augmented reality device and operating system (3 minute read) Google recently hired a lead for its Operating System team for Augmented Reality and posted job listings that indicate that the company is getting serious about AR.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-12
item.description: Here’s everything Samsung announced at its August Unpacked event (3 minute read) Samsung announced four new devices at its August 11 Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-17
item.description: Amazon wants to scan your body to make perfectly fitting shirts (2 minute read) Amazon recently unveiled a brand called ‘Made for You’ that makes custom-fitted clothes.
